Given its quality and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering your appreciation for the product, I propose a special offer of $95 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, so don't miss out! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:

(2) Reject Alice's offer
